descriptionlist.description: Logs failed passcode data to /var/mobile/failedpasscodedata. This was requested on the r/jailbreak subreddit by /u/t2magician. WORKS ON IOS 10 ONLY.
If you want it for iOS 11 I could make that work, just let me know. I just made it specifically for iOS 10 because that's the device version it was requested for.
